DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Achalasia
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , dose response study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm ; arm receives different dose botulinum toxin type A . All patient undergo flexible upper gastrointestinal endoscopy . Botulinum toxin inject low esophageal sphincter 4 quadrant . Some patient may receive second treatment , depend response and/or time relapse . Patients follow daily 7 day , every 1-6 month 1-2 year treatment . Completion date provide represent completion date grant per OOPD record
